description:
"The border population [...] are familiar with [...] some of our coins. [...] They like the old and well known money, coins milled, or showing a two-horse chariot."
Tacitus, De Origine et situ Germanorum, 98 CE.
tooltip:
Using those strange metal disks of your neighbours seems to draw more foreign traders.
Traders +25% Walk Speed, which quickly increases trade income.
